Description: Fragment of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Oval handle, gradual curve. Rectangular stamp. Clay near fine buff.
Curator's comments: Petrie drew two such pieces (Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 28a, 21 and 185, 4, the latter illustrated herewith; for the other see British Museum 2011,5003.247).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0392)
